main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Brooklyn, New York on 1 October 1956, observed using ground radar.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between three to five minutes., Only one object was observed., The object was reported to have come from the southwest and disappeared over the northwest horizon., Observers noted the object had no tail or wings., Conclusions suggested the sighting was probably due to a balloon.
witness description: Observers included one identifiable person and five others whose occupations are unknown.
